Study for an Altarpiece: the Madonna Worshipped by Saints and, Possibly, Donors

label: Description
value: The Virgin is seated upon clouds having the Christ child in her lap. Some cherubim are beside her. On the earth are two groups of three worshippers each. The left one includes a holy pope, the right on Saint Francis. A man in cuirass, at right, and a woman, at left, represent, probably, the donors.

Study for an Altarpiece: Christ with Saint Stephen, Saint Paul, and Saint Francis

label: Description
value: Christ is seated upon clouds holding the globe in the left hand. Cherubim surround him. The three saints stand below. Saint Stephen points with his left hand upwards; he holds a stone in the right hand. Saint Paul apparently listens to him. Saint Francis, at right, is shown in profile turned toward left with raised hand. The upper outline from a segment.
